headline: Does HII's New Laser Facility Investment Signal a Shift in Advanced Defense Technology Strategy?
summary: Huntington Ingalls Industries recently announced a capital investment in a new integration, production, and test facility to support phase two of the U.S. Army's Enduring-High Energy Laser (E-HEL) weapon system program, expanding its existing laser technology capabilities and enabling prototype assembly and testing. This move highlights HII’s commitment to advancing next-generation defense technologies and reinforces its role in supporting rapid innovation and supply chain resilience for...
